Nice to meet you!
I'm Arne, a designer from Berlin
Get to know me

Arne Schütze

User Experience Designer

I'm a Senior User Experience Designer at Fjord, where I am responsible for creating innovative services, products and strategies for clients from varying industries from all around the globe.

I tackle problems and figure out how to solve them by using service design methods.
This way I ensure that I gain as many insights as possible in order to shape my workflow and start translating insights into ideas. For communicating these ideas, I heavily rely on rapid prototyping to make every phase and iteration of a project as tangible as possible.

I’d like to think of myself as

passionate

I love what I do – designing and creating services and experiences has always been more than a just a job to me.

curious

I'm driven by the need to understand how things work, in order to find out how I might be able to improve them.

collaborative

I work closely together with everyone in my team, wether that is fellow designers, developers, clients or users.

reliable

I take responsibility for the quality of every aspect of my work while delivering it on time as well.

focused

I'm able to keep my focus at the tasks at hand even in distracting environments or in stressful situations.

supportive

I share what I learned from others or what I taught myself, as things wouldn't take on half their values without it.

People I worked with say

  • Michel Tofahrn

    Design Lead, Fjord Berlin

    “Arne has a very constant output of awesome solutions and he pushes projects to the limits in terms of quality.”

  • Sven Neitzel

    Designer, Fjord Berlin

    “Arne is a thoughtful and patient team player. He supports everyone who is in need of advice.”

  • Jennifer Dettmering

    Project Manager, Fjord Berlin

    “Arne is structured and well organised, has an overview of the whole project and always keeps the big picture in mind.”

  • Scott Robinson

    Biz Dev Director, Fjord Berlin

    “Arne has a great way of explaining to and leading clients toward the goals which they want to achieve but also those they don't know they want to achieve.”

Some of the clients I made happy

Want me to do the same for you?

I’m always open for new opportunities that offer a chance to learn from, and collaborate with inspiring colleagues towards creating impactful, relevant services and experiences.
